nodes.text: The Rycar Run is a mini adventure for use in any era, published on the Wizards of the Coast website. It was written by Brian Campbell and published on December 6, 2001.

One of the most notorious smugglers in the Tatooine system hides in a secret and well-defended base in the middle of a dangerous asteroid field. Those who know his handiwork say that he's psychotic or suicidal — or both. And it's the heroes' job to bring him back alive.
"The Rycar Run" is intended for four player characters of 4th to 6th level.
A group of spacers are hired to locate and bring to justice the notorius sumuggler Rycar Ryjerd. After a lengthy investigation, they locate his hideout in the Obana Belt.
